website_summaries.verdict: This long pillow provides support for several spots on your back while driving and includes a neck support pillow.
pros: Strap helps you adjust height as needed
Doesn't push you too far forward
Memory foam molds to your body for comfort
cons: The strap on the neck portion of this car pillow set is not as sturdy as it could be and sometimes lets the pillow slip

customer_reviews.title: great neck support!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new Toyota Tacoma and the headrest contour is very uncomfortable for the way I sit in the vehicle. Unlike our Subaru Forester which has a 3 position adjustable head rest - the Tacoma has a set position. The neck pillow in the Travel Ease set is working wonderfully for me. I reversed the head rest and strapped the pillow at the base of my neck. Presto! comfort while still keeping the whiplash safety of a headrest. Great product - will recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: K.K

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This support did not work well for me, I think it actually needs to come up to support the mid and upper back as well. I am 5'7" so i would think average height people would have the same experience. The thickness of the foam in the lumbar area is too thick and pushes you too far forward in the seat. Then there is no support behind your shoulders at all. It helped with my lower back pain but caused me to have mid and upper back pain. Not a good fit for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: SLR914

customer_reviews.title: Love the back piece, but not a fan of the neck support
customer_reviews.text: The back support is great (5 stars). It is very comfortable. My husband and I use it slightly differently, but we both really like it. Both of us are not impressed with the neck support piece(2-3 stars). It doesn't seem to sit right so the support is awkward and a little uncomfortable. I really like the material they are made of. It is the perfect balance between soft comfort and support. I am happy I made the purchase, but I do wish the neck piece was designed differently.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kroeker

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my father. He need to drive long distance to work every day and he likes to sit in the car during rest time. So it's important to have a comfortable car seat cushion. This car seat cushion looks pretty, and the color match our car. It provides good support to the back and neck which makes driving more fun and comfortable. The surface is pretty soft. So I think it worth the price. I will recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: btan

customer_reviews.title: Thick foam. Well-made. Fits to your shape, but no firm lumbar support.
customer_reviews.text: This back and neck pillow set is well-made with strong stitching and strong fabric, with straps to hold to your car seat and a bag to stuff it into for storage. The foam filling is thick and dense. However, what i wanted and expected was firm lumbar support. This foam fits to your shape as you lean into the pillow, but the lower back support is not firm enough to hold a weak lower back in place on long drives. So, overall, you can get a lot of support from this set, but dont expect the strongest lumbar support.
customer_reviews.author: Moose And Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable for In-Home Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very confortable and I primarily use it for my chair that I have in my home rather than the car since I'm seated here more. The cushion is very thick and soft. Easy to attach and even the logo portion is soft so it is not obtrusive to the rest of the material/cushion. No issues with fitting to my chair and the head rest goes perfect with the previous headrest that came with my chair so it can stay upright and positioned perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Suprised me!  Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this to function as well as it does. HUGE improvement for my back over the way the newer car seats designs put you in the shape of a banana behind the wheel. This cushion allows my back to straighten out and my chin to be level -- as opposed to being angled down toward my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Tango

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but minimal lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is high quality and does offer support and increase comfort. However, it doesn't offer any particular lumbar support because the material compresses behind you. I sometimes use the neck pillow as an additional lumbar cushion. In general, the neck pillow is an odd size for actual neck support. The other option is to flip the back rest and use an additional lumbar cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Just absolutely comfortable. My husband had open heart surgery, and had difficulty sitting/standing, etc. during his recovery. The lumbar cushion made it easier for him to sit back on the couch and chairs around the house and now he just loves it due to its comfort. Plan to use the headrest in my daughter's car.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My Back is Thankful for this Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to use when I go to my salon as the chairs there were causing me some serious back pain. Using this pillow has been great and I can no go to my hair salon, sit under the dryer, and come back home without any incurring any pain later in the day. It's very light and just the right size to make it easy to carry around. It also comes with a carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice product/ as advertised. Comfortable adjustable support Get neck support too.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! I like the neck support the best (extra) . Adjustable up and down. A more heavy duty strap/buckle tension hardware. You could add your own. But otherwise, a good product and value for money. I’m 72, always had a ratty old lumbar wedge, I drive 4 hours to see my son, 7 hours to see my daughter. Done it many times. With this lumbar support with the neck support added, I arrived almost astonishingly pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Riverguy

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion. Provides great support to my neck/back.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car to relieve my back/neck pain due to driving for 1 hour to and from work. It really helped and provided good support. The cushion is really good. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Memory Foam, You've Won Again.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this for my car like I bought it for. I'm just here to say I'm currently using it as a pillow and it might not make it to my car. Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: SnowRose

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The bucket seats in my 2014 Ford Focus were too deep for my back. My arms weren't comfortable trying to reach the steering wheel as I like to keep the seat further away for my feet to reach the pedals. This keeps me seated upright and has a strap that keeps it in place. It offers the support I need, but in the cold it is a bit stiffer. It is the perfect size. I don't really use the headrest too much, but it is good that it is there.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: I already have the head rest, but do not have the back rest and this is one of the best cushioning effect I have seen before for this price. The quality is really good, it was in a compressed state, so I was a little confused but the effect was amazing and gives very good feel. Overall, I love this seat cushion and the head rest.
customer_reviews.author: Eirene

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased this item since my family love to travel by car
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this item since my family love to travel by car. I have been searching for a neck and lumbar support and so glad that i found this product, its really helpful and very comfortable and helps your back and neck. The quality of this product is top notch and what i like the most is the material that they use. I highly recommend this product, its a must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer A+
customer_reviews.text: It is the best thing ever. I feel like I’m on a cloud when driving. Life-changing
customer_reviews.author: Inhye Jang

customer_reviews.title: This set of lumbar and neck support cushions were perfect for me to use in the car (2016 VW ...
customer_reviews.text: This set of lumbar and neck support cushions were perfect for me to use in the car (2016 VW Jetta). I am a small frame female and found the thickness of the cushions to be JUST RIGHT! I use them along with wedge seat cushions to raise my hips so that I am sitting at a 90 degree angle (instead of sitting with my hips declining into the seat that has an unnatural angle for sitting for driving). Now with all of my added cushions to my seat, I am finally relieved of the hip pain I had been feeling while driving.
customer_reviews.author: D.Tau

customer_reviews.title: Add comfort to your commute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my boyfriend who drives a lot in general and far, in city traffic, everyday for work. He also has lots of issues with his back and such. He absolutely loves this support! Only thing we are worried about is him falling asleep driving because it's soooo comfortable for him! (Kidding, but seriously comfortable!) Definitely recommend if you're looking for something like this. Money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Move on.  Nothing to see here.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Missed the return date. What a bummer. I tried this on a road trip and have never been so sore.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Quality cushion
customer_reviews.text: It’s very quality cushion, very smooth and comfort. After use I feel back pain relief, while driving it’s easy to you and it supports very much. It’s great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Anil

customer_reviews.title: A personal wedge of comfort
customer_reviews.text: Upholstery matches my car interior as if it was built for my car. The black wedge doesn’t look like anything fancy but the memory foam really helps my back tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Star grazer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is for a car given the headrest it comes with, but I find the back support extremely comfortable for my office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The backrest is very comfortable and works very good when traveling. The pillow is uncomfortable for traveling, but works well for sleeping while travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie L. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and relaxing used with arm chair
customer_reviews.text: I have a deep-seated arm chair that's been bothering my back. This cushion is the perfect depth, fills in the gap, and provides a moderate, comfortable amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: Shambhavi Sarasvati

customer_reviews.title: Comfy orthopedic back cushion
customer_reviews.text: I recently returned from a month-long road trip and used the Travel Ease Lumbar Cushion for the first time. It was not only more comfortable than any other backrest I've used in the past, it also prevented any pressure and tightness from building up in my lower back. I experienced no stiffness or soreness anywhere when getting out of the car after an eight hour drive; a veritable miracle. The Cushion is also great for indoor use; anytime you have to sit in an uncomfortable chair for a while. I definitely plan to take it with me next time I have to do jury duty.
customer_reviews.author: RHW25

customer_reviews.title: Made my car usable again
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older subaru that no longer has or never had lumbar support and after any trip over an hour I was in pain. This pillow works better than anything else I have tried and longer trips are possible again. Using the neck rest pillow gives me a neck ache, but my wife swears by it.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Problem Solver Cushions
customer_reviews.text: Received the cushions today...WOW! Awesome quality and they totally solved the problem of my very uncomfortable Ford Fusion 2012 driver's seat. The memory foam is top quality. The covers are attractive, appear durable, AND they zip off for washing. So pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Travel Ease makes traveling a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set that allowed me to be comfortable as I drove for a few hours. I love this Travel Ease set and would recommend it to anyone that sits in a car for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Saint Jean

customer_reviews.title: Firmer
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be a little firmer. Lost support cause it flattens to easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores I. Aflleje

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and forms to my back , only critique is it doesn’t stay secure behind your back would be nice if there was an extra strap to make it stay in place better. But overall a great product and has reduced my back pain while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Karly

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This back support allows me to drive or ride comfortably for long or short distances. It is not bulky and it can be positioned for smaller and taller individuals. I will order one for my computer chair at home. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: HorsesRFun2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Cushion is perfect... waiting to buy another when in stock!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Drive in comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I have back issues and my new cars seats are uncomfortable. I bought these cushions and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Durand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lumbar support. I use it in my car for longer trips and when I am sitting at my desk for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! I use it for both my work chair and my car seat when I need to drive long distance. So comfy and much less back strain.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: and I keep shifting around in the seat trying to find a more comfortable position (with no luck)
customer_reviews.text: Driving my wife's Odyssey mini van, my back usually starts hurting after 90 minutes or so, and I keep shifting around in the seat trying to find a more comfortable position (with no luck). With this product between me and the seatback, I survived a 7-hour drive from NJ to Maine (and back) with no discomfort at all. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and feels great. Use it on any chair or in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Marlee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, good quality. Neck pillow just a little too big
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, the neck pillow I just cant seem to get feeling just right. But very comfy and just as described
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Elder

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Because I'm short, this helps me a lot by filling in some extra space between my lower back to chair.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems very comfortable. Just did a trip of 2300 miles with this and it seemed great.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Phinney

customer_reviews.title: m'lady even commented on how it makes the ride more comfortable (5-stars, indeed
customer_reviews.text: ..m'lady even commented on how it makes the ride more comfortable (5-stars, indeed!..haha)..
customer_reviews.author: c.

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for my beautiful wife. She loves it. She punched me in the arm for not getting it earlier. She says driving longer distances is considerably more comfortable with it. We recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my car seat. It is one of the most comfortable lumbar supports I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, definitely a great addition to my long drives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lumber support for your back and neck
customer_reviews.text: Great lumber support for your back and neck. The linen and material are durable and blended perfectly with the car seats. Can't wait to try them on the next long distance drive.
customer_reviews.author: Numberguy

customer_reviews.title: Work well for my work chair!
customer_reviews.text: Helps a lot at work. Seems too built for me for the car but I'm shorter than most people. I like the feel and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provides very mediocre support
customer_reviews.text: Used for car seat. Neck/upper back portion sagged down - did nothing to help. Lumbar support very soft not supportive. Slid around all over the place on a Leather Seat.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Form fitting comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Conforms to your body and made the long rides do-able
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveling neck pain gone
customer_reviews.text: I use the back rest, not the headrest. It gives me enough elevation off the back of the seat so my neck doesn’t curve weirdly and spaz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does help relieve back pain from car trips
customer_reviews.text: Little too thick and needs another strap to hold it in place on the bottom but it definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy. My wife has chronic back pain and was very surprised how well this worked in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Caden Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are really good! We have been travel a long way with great confort
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: It was so comfortable. Now I use it on my office chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this before a long trip. It was so comfortable. Now I use it on my office chair. Very please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. I recommend for anyone with a bad back to get this.
customer_reviews.author: IL

customer_reviews.title: I use it in a 2017 Kia Sportage which has terrible headrests - this keeps my posture aligned and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality product! Wish I could have just bought the neck support part. I use it in a 2017 Kia Sportage which has terrible headrests - this keeps my posture aligned and makes the ride comfortable. The back support part is too bulky. Hope to find a use for it someday.
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Simplicity

customer_reviews.title: Greatly improves comfort level on road trips
customer_reviews.text: I use the neck support and my husband likes the lumbar, but not the neck support. Wish they could be ordered individually. Well made. Plan to order another set, so we have them in each vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: marg

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as describe
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as describe. Did nothing to ease pain when driving. Just like something bulky in your back while driving, no purpose. Not worth of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality, size, and convenience of these seat and neck cushions. Although many good reviews, it did not work for me. I am 4'11 so the forms of both items did not fit well with my petite frame. I experienced noticeable backaches and strains on my neck each time driving 50 miles to and 50 miles from work. I will be returning it and shopping for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good on long trips
customer_reviews.text: Seems to provide a bit of dampening from the bumps on the road as well as promote better posture.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: Literally one of the best purchases I've ever made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is literally one of the best things I've ever ordered on Amazon, and that's saying something because I buy almost everything on Amazon. I am a realtor, which means I spend a lot of time in the car, and I've dealt with L5/S1 disc issues for quite a while now. Over the last few months, the pain was traveling into my butt and hamstring, and was always made worse by sitting in the car for long periods of time. I ordered this support and have been using it for about a month now, and I cannot express how much better I feel. The disc issue isn't gone, but the persistent pain is gone. I can't recommend it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C. McWhite

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, something that doesn’t make me need to see a chiropractor every time I spend an hour in my car. The stock lumbar support in my new Explorer is way too low and causes more harm than good, so something different was necessary. The way that the seat is shaped caused other pillows to squeeze my sides, which caused a new kind of pain. This lumbar support along with the neck support did the trick. It is still a little uncomfortable, the memory foam still pushes on your back and wears thin after a while. My chiropractor is missing me now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 2018 Chrysler Pacifica Touring Plus a few months ago. I love the vehicle, but the seats are horribly uncomfortable. I tried a different lumbar support pillow, but hated it. This combination of a lumbar support and a cervical pillow did the trick. Now, I'm looking forward to many long, comfortable road trips in my new minivan!
customer_reviews.author: nel

customer_reviews.title: Saves my back
customer_reviews.text: The seats in my Tesla model 3 absolutely suck! After 30 minutes of driving the model 3, my back becomes slightly stiff and painful probably from lack of support in the seats. Anyway, this product goes onto the seat easily and I haven't felt any back pain from driving. The neck cushion alignment is a bit off on my seat currently and I'll have to mess with it when I have time. The only reason I gave a 4 star instead of 5 is because of the plastic packaging. It already comes in case/bag so I think the plastic wrap is unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Mori

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help on a 16 hour trip
customer_reviews.text: I gave this two stars because it might help relieve pain on short distance trips. I used this for a 16 hour car trip and it didn't relieve my hip and shoulder pain. The pillow is awkward and hard to get it in the right position.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are fantastic! Everyone who has sat in my car using them, has ordered them for their own cars. I have only one wish that I Hope will be passed along to the manufacturer. I would love to purchase a second set of covers to be used when these covers are being laundered. These pillows are a definite buy! This is the second set we have purchased. After using them for three years, I cannot be without them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waay too thick
customer_reviews.text: the product seems well made and does provide back support but is waay too thick, once installed in my car I had to push the seat all the way back just to get into the car, and then my feet wouldn't reach the pedals. I will have to search the catalogs like Carol Wright or Dr Leonards for a simple foam one.
customer_reviews.author: see hearnow

customer_reviews.title: Save your lower back.  This cusion is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This saved my back on a long trip for the holidays. I am struggling with lower back pain and this made our 16 hour drive bearable. I had hardly any pain due to using this wonderful cushion. It molds to the body and does not get hard and uncomfortable like some. It was worth what I paid for it. I highly recommend. I did not use the neck pillow just because I didn't need it. I am going to purchase a second one for my chair at work as I sit at a desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: rickv

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for small people to drive more comfortably
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new car in which the driver seat does not adjust as much to my small size as other cars. The pillow helps me reach the pedals and makes driving more comfortable for me. I am so glad !! Have not used it in summer time yet so I do not know if it makes back sweat. So far I am very happy with it - only the headrest neck cushion I have not gotten used to yet but I think its just a matter of time. Cushion seems good quality and price was very fair!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend the back support piece but not the neck support piece.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because we spend a lot of time in the car traveling around the states. The back support piece is great!! The neck support piece, not so much. It caused more pain in my neck and across my shoulders, and I developed a headache almost instantly. Maybe it’s just me and perhaps I need to keep adjusting until I get it right. It’s too “squishy” and I probably need something that’s more firm. I also purchased the ComfySure car seat wedge and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I've got a Ford Focus and the seat has ZERO lumbar support. With a 1 hour commute, I was starting to having horrible lower back pain. After I started using this pillow, my back pain went away. Totally worth the purchase! Critique: I have leather seats and the back pillow tends to slip/creep after I've been driving a while. During the summer when it's hot the pillow gets mushy. During the winter when it's cold the pillow gets hard.
customer_reviews.author: ManKitten

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Got my lumbar support today . Oh My Oh My - i am so happy . It came in the black sac . The material is smooth and the lumbar support is so comfortable . Immediately put in on my car seat. Very easy to set it up. The lumbar support is really great . It is a great gift for my back and neck .
customer_reviews.author: AMZLH

customer_reviews.title: Headrest = AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my car excellently. I drive a 2008 Kia Optima and I am 5'2.5". Neck rest equals amazing! Back support is nice, but for me specifically I need it to arch out almost twice as much. However, I think that is a very specific need for me not an overall flaw or knock on the product.
customer_reviews.author: 1,4dimethylbenzene

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I must say I love this pillows for my car. Ever since I got them I haven't had back pain ever again. Buying this pillows have been one of my best decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Adalberto L.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: When I used the 1st time it was somewhat uncomfortable as it takes some time to settle. The width is perfect but it didn't set my body as I am big. The neck rest is really comfortable and it almost gave me asleep feeling while driving. So be careful about this.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash

customer_reviews.title: ... memory foam really hugs my lower back and gives great support. I am tall
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam really hugs my lower back and gives great support. I am tall, so the head support cushion doesn't lineup with my neck area very well. I have back issues (lumbar herniated discs) and I this really helps. I definitely recommend this for people with back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money I paid!
customer_reviews.text: This sure is comfortable! Great support on my neck area. Although I really wished this could help me more with my lower back problem, which would require more solid support. But I still think this is worth the money I paid. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: AlexLiu

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: having lower back issue for a long time. Using while driving home from work, it relieved my back.. well support with the memory foam. Fit and work well on Odyssey. Using every drives. Didn't use the neck support.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: Good support where it is but the gap between the seat portion and the headrest just moved my pain from lower back to upper back. Added a rolled up towel to fill the gap and I can finally drive without killing my back, even if it looks stupid.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonny Mouse

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Very well made. After many years of trying to find a product that fits my needs I have finally been successful. This product provides firm support for my ailing back. Use of this product has greatly reduced the back pain I've experienced in the past from poorly designed products. Finally... comfort! Amen.
customer_reviews.author: doyle miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: First lumbar that has actually worked for me! I drive a Prius and my lower back would start to hurt after about 30 min of driving.... Just took my first trip with this bad boy...2 hours and no pain at all! Definitely worth the high $50 price tag!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: Extra firm. I am short so I used the head rest BELOW it and bam the over sized truck seat finally fits me!
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love mine wish it was a little harder though need more pressure on my lumbar but overall very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it anymore
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't very comfortable but that may be due to my own neck issues - seems oddly shaped
customer_reviews.author: desertlilly

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t work for me. Still found sitting very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: Currently in my car, it's pretty comfy. The back piece is a little intrusive, but easy to get used to . On cold mornings it's hard as a mf ROCK though!
customer_reviews.author: Evan A

customer_reviews.title: Very, very soft! It also has a nice spring to it.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very soft! It also has a nice spring to it. It was delivered to my front door in less than 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Holden

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a Recliner :-)
customer_reviews.text: After just one day trip, my husband (about 6 ft.) and I (about 5 ft.) agree that we really like these comfortable cushions! They look very nice, and I love seeing them when I open the car door because I know it's going to feel like a recliner on my back when I sit down.
customer_reviews.author: AuntofSACJHJASCEI

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not comfortable in my opinion, good cushion, not a comfortable shape though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great back pillow!! The head pillow is a bit on the large side don't see using it
customer_reviews.author: rchicago

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The headrest is for me and the Lumbar is for my husband. We really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Around the Clock

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!! I use it in my car. Very comfortable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: ... seat that pinches your rib cage this is a great solution.
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer in a car seat that pinches your rib cage this is a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Achy back, no more
customer_reviews.text: Love my new memory foam car cushion from Travel Ease. My leather seats are firm and I could never get comfortable. I installed my new lumbar cushion and instantly felt like my back was molded into the driver's seat. Neck cushion adjusts on my headrest easily. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jane Martin

customer_reviews.title: It is great. My husband had back pain when he was ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great. My husband had back pain when he was driving. The pain gone when he used this product. I bought one more for my son. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Long road trip, back pain. This was the fix I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't be more comfortable. Every time I drive to work
customer_reviews.text: Can't be more comfortable. Every time I drive to work, I feel like I'm still in my bed driving. When I drive home, it gives me so much relief and support.
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but not a perfect match for my body
customer_reviews.text: the memory foam is relatively soft, so that it does not seem to provide a lot of support to my lower back, but it definitely helps. The neck support is too small to hardly reach my neck.. Would need to it be at least another inch thick. The products appear well made and durable and high quality. The fitting issues will be personal to each user. I am driving a 2013 honda odyssey and I am sick of the hard leather ("luxury") bucket seats that seem intent on destroying my body. Good luck navigating the jungle of products available on amazon. No doubt, confusion is good for sales, as there is no easy way to compare by size.
customer_reviews.author: StarMarc

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I recently went on a long cross country drive. The extra support helped immensely with back and neck pain. The one thing I did not like about it is the crappy adjustment/attachment system. The straps really don't hold it on the seat very well and I could not get the straps to pull the back cushion up to where I needed it. I am tall and had to keep pushing it up on my back even with the straps adjusted as far up as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Courtland

customer_reviews.title: 2 issues for me but may be great for you!
customer_reviews.text: Great made product. I only had 2 things i wish were a little different with this product. The headrest part is harder than i expected. I wish that my head sunk a little bit more than it does. Actually if you want to use it how i do you really have to force your head back. The backrest part is perfect for the foam. I thought i had seen some straps on it in the picture though. It doesn't have straps to keep it in place so you have to adjust it after you move. I ordered some straps and I'm going to have my mom sew them on. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Wagner

product_meta.title: Travel Ease Car Lumbar Support Back Cushion & Headrest Neck Pillow Kit for Seat Cushion Memory Foam Erognomic Design Universal Fit for Car Seat with Back Pain Relief (Black)
product_meta.description:
- Do you experience low back pain suffering by sitting for long periods?
- Do you drive on daily basis? 
- Are you looking for comfortable lumbar cushion set for your lumbar health?

Travel Ease Lumbar Cushion Set is applied Patented Ergonomic Streamline and Zero Pressure Technology which assist you to reach ultimate in comfort & support for natural low back pain relief. 

Many reasons to buy Travel Ease lumbar cushion set: 
1. Zero Pressure Technology and Ergonomic Streamline, extremely comfortable Travel Ease Lumbar Cushion Set is not too hard or too lumpy. Zero pressure technology is applied to assure you comfortable experience. Say goodbye to slouching and prevent chronic lumbar muscle strain by keeping your spine alignment and improving your sitting posture.
2. Yellow Color Therapy Level Premium Memory Foam 
Travel Ease Yellow Color Memory Form is different from white color plain-looking ones in the market. It is high density, high-end and physical therapy level memory foam. It is thermo-sensitive, slow rebound memory foam, odor-free and won’t flatten out overtime like others. 
3. Premium, Durable and Breathable Fabric Covers
The outer fabric covers are durable, breathable, anti-mate, removable and machine-washable.
4. Exceptional Value
The lumbar cushion set is well-packed with a handy travel bag. It’s portable and easy to give you friends as kind and sweet gift. In addition, the great price includes both neck pillow and lumbar cushion. You’ll get exceptional value with many years of use. 
5. Size and Weight of Travel Ease Lumbar Cushion Set
Neck Pillow Size:11.8×7.9×4.7(inch)
Neck Pillow Weight:0.8(lb) 
Lumbar Cushion Size: 16.5×15.7×3.9(inch) 
Lumbar Cushion Weight:1.5(lb)
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR LOWER BACK PAIN SUPPORT-Travel Ease Patented High Density Therapy Level Memory Foam is soft but supportive with ergonomic streamline design for lower back pain relief.

FOR YOUR SAFETY-Maintaining and molding your sitting posture by balancing external forces are essential to prevent hurts while there is an emergency brake or avoiding chronic lumbar muscle strain on long distance drive.

UNIVERSAL FIT FOR MOST CARS WITH JUST RIGHT SIZE: Travel Ease Ergonomic Design car lumbar cushion and headrest pillow is considering thickness to offer enough lower back support and headrest support but won’t be too thick. The size of back support pillow is 16.5×15.7×3.9(inch)while the headrest pillow is 11.8×7.9×4.7(inch)
TWO VENTILATED COVERS: The outer fabric covers are durable, breathable, anti-mite, removable and machine-washable while the internal cover is protective. The whole set is Odor-Free.
VALUEABLE WITH LIFE TIME GUARANTEED: A great price includes both lumbar cushion and neck pillow. Any dislike or any problem could be returned and refund within 60 days. Hassle-Free.
